name: RoboScooper
description:
If You wanna try an HTML5 build of the game that had a bug that I couldn't finish up in time for submission. I got it working and uploaded it to newgrounds
************************************************************************
https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/760170


Roboscooper you have to help clean up after an out of control puppy who is pooping and peeing everywhere!

Game Rules

  • Try to clean up as much as you can
  • You lose when 20 enemies are on screen
  • Lose control when you have 10+ enemies on screen

Attack Enemies from these directions

                   



- Touching pupper makes you loose control
- This robot is out of Control

These barriers are only breakable by using bombs

- Bomb - Cooldown after 12 actions
- Fast Bomb - gained after 10 kills. (Bigger Blast)
